name: The Fennecs Awards 2024!
summary: Today we announce the first annual Fennecs Game Awards! The most luxorious and important game award that has every existed. Today we announce all the game categories, rules, and more!

name: ComputerCraft: The Best Minecraft Mod
summary: Discussing what I find as one of the coolest Minecraft Mods to ever exist, one where it allows the users to program robots in lua while remaining survival friendly.
